summary: Completed comprehensive testing of agricultural app refactoring - new obligatory fields model for Visitas/Tratamientos and catalog references for Contratos

minor_issues.issue: Field validation expects 'superficie_tratar' instead of legacy field names
minor_issues.impact: Minor - affects only Tareas creation which is not part of main refactoring

design_issues.issue: Console hydration warnings for span elements in table structures
Some tratamiento records show 'N/A' for cultivo/campa√±a (old records not migrated)

passed_tests: Contratos CRUD with new catalog references (proveedor_id, cultivo_id)
Visitas CRUD with new obligatory fields (parcela_id, cultivo_id, campana)
Tratamientos CRUD with new obligatory fields (cultivo_id, campana, parcelas_ids)
Backend field validations (missing required fields return 422)
Backend API filters (by campana, cultivo_id, contrato_id)
Frontend authentication and navigation (7/7 nav items working)
Tratamientos guided flow with multiple parcela selection
Obligatory field indicators in frontend forms
